root.message: The INST_MANDATE field for indicator 16-2-2, translated into en
root.data: By Resolution number 8/2018, of March 21, article 15, paragraph e) that approves the Organic Statute of the Ministry of Interior (MINT), which, among other duties of the Planning, Study and Documentation Directorate, directs and controls the process of collecting, processing, analyzing and inferring statistical information.
